source: pomander of safety<tab>pomanders of safety<tab>Pomander of Safety<tab>Removes all traps from the current floor.
target: pomander of safety<tab>pomanders of safety<tab>Pomander of Safety<tab>Removes all traps from the current floor.

source: pomander of sight<tab>pomanders of sight<tab>Pomander of Sight<tab>Reveals the current floor's map and the location of all hidden traps.

source: pomander of strength<tab>pomanders of strength<tab>Pomander of Strength<tab>Increases damage dealt and HP recovered via healing magic by 30%.

source: pomander of alteration<tab>pomanders of alteration<tab>Pomander of Alteration<tab>Changes the enemy occupying a random room on the next floor into a mimic or a mandragora.
